programme.desc: The SVU must break through military red tape when a soldier is suspected of sexual assault.

programme.desc: Rollins races to rescue a girl being held captive by her father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Fin investigates a man's claim that his sister was gang raped.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An Alzheimer's patient claims she was raped, but her illness casts doubt on the case; Fin's sergeant orders come in.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young woman takes a man hostage at gunpoint; Benson makes an attempt to defuse the situation; the team discovers the shocking motive behind the abduction.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson's suspicions about a kidnapping victim uncover a dangerous criminal network prepared to silence anyone who gets in its way.

programme.desc: The FBI team captures an al-Qaida leader planning an attack on Washington, D.C.; Tara works with a code-breaker.

programme.desc: Sue and Jack investigate the sighting of a Nazi war criminal; Myles and Bobby square off against the office manager.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: Sue meets Jack and Bobby's FBI mentor; Lucy reconnects with her high-school love.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When a woman's burned body is found in a car with evidence that her child was kidnapped, Brennan and Booth's investigation leads to a suspect who is in the Witness Protection Program.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth's investigation identifies a decomposed body found in a local alley as that of a friendless teen.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Booth and Brennan investigate when police find the dug-up corpse of a young woman in the trunk of a Salvadoran gang member's car.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: At the scene of a plane crash involving Chinese diplomats, Brennan finds three small bone fragments that did not come from the plane and might have something to do with a local man who went missing five years earlier.

programme.desc: During a murder investigation, the team uncovers a fraudulent charity targeting those looking for missing military personnel; Tony considers adopting a stray cat that followed him home.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigate a road accident that killed a Petty Officer while Gibbs tries to clear a Navy Hospital Corpsman accused of illegally providing medical aid to the victims of the crash.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Inclement weather keeps DiNozzo, Bishop and her husband at the Dulles airport, where they end up working a case involving an elevated terrorist threat.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: When the city's internet is shut down three weeks before Christmas, the team consults with three imprisoned cyberterrorists.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates a series of crime scenes that appear to be copycats of previous cases; two of Gibbs' ex-wives show up at a crime scene.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A rescue mission in Syria reveals evidence that indicates an American was involved in a social worker's capture; DiNozzo's strange behavior is questioned.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An openly gay Navy lieutenant set to receive the Medal of Honor is murdered; Palmer gets ready for fatherhood.

programme.desc: A murdered Marine and alumnus of the military academy DiNozzo attended is found with a student's photograph in his hand; Bishop and her husband ask Gibbs and the team to dinner.

programme.desc: When an explosion rocks a summit on global terror, the team suspects Gibbs' archenemy is responsible; Gibbs tries to help Fornell after his wife's murder.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A murder victim turns out to have been living under an alias created for one of Gibbs' undercover cases from 20 years ago.

programme.title: NCIS
